name: Speekr-WordPress-Plugin
description: Hey, I'm a plugin for speakers using WordPress as a CMS.
author: Geoffrey Crofte

scripts.watch: node-sass assets/css/src/ -o assets/css/ --source-map true --output-style expanded --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -w
scripts.css: npm run compile:css ; npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: csso assets/css/speekr-admin.css -o assets/css/speekr-admin.min.css --source-map assets/css/speekr-admin.min.map && csso assets/css/speekr.css -o assets/css/speekr.min.css --source-map assets/css/speekr.min.map
